name: Air-Fried Butter Cake
author: Launa
summary: This is a basic butter cake; the trickiest bit was finding a cake tin to fit in the air fryer. I went with a ring tin, which works really well and makes it cook even quicker. Top with confectioners' sugar.
directions: Preheat an air fryer to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)
Spray a small fluted tube pan with cooking spray
Beat butter and 1/4 cup plus 2 tablespoons sugar together in a bowl using an electric mixer until light and creamy
Add egg and mix until smooth and fluffy
Add milk and mix batter thoroughly
Transfer batter to the prepared pan; use the back of a spoon to level the surface
Place the pan in the air fryer basket
Bake until a toothpick inserted into the cake comes out clean
Turn cake out of pan and allow to cool, about 5 minutes
